messages.content: I believe that I can make a difference to people's lives in North East Fife.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will make a transformational investment in Scottish education to change the current average state.
The Liberal Democrats will boost spending for mental health treatment to ensure people can access mental health care when they need it.

issues.education: Our education system used to be the very best in the world, now it’s just average. The Liberal Democrats will make a transformational investment in Scottish education to change this.
issues.health: Our health services were world class, now waiting times are too long, targets are being missed and many people can’t access mental health care when they need it. We will boost spending for mental health treatment.

community.content: Local people tell me they are looking for an MP who cares about our area, and will be active in our community.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been representing people in North East Fife for many years as a councillor in the East Neuk and I have the experience to stand up for you as your Member of Parliament.

contactInformation.address: Liam McMenemie, 17A Nelson Street, St. Andrews, KY16 8AJ

examples: ...waiting times are too long, targets are being missed and many people can’t access mental health care when they need it...
I believe that I can make a difference to people's lives in North East Fife.
Lots of people are saying that the SNP haven’t been as good as they thought they would be.
Local people tell me they are looking for an MP who cares about our area, and will be active in our community.
the SNP haven’t been as good as they thought they would be. The SNP have taken their eye off the ball.
opposing the Tories taking us towards an extreme Brexit deal.
the SNP haven’t been as good as they thought they would be. The SNP have taken their eye off the ball.
opposing the Tories taking us towards an extreme Brexit deal.
I have been representing people in North East Fife for many years as a councillor in the East Neuk and I have the experience to stand up for you as your Member of Parliament.
